name: Unit 3 - When Grandma Was Young
description: 關於童年能力與經歷的問答
creator: 系統預置

questions.question: What could Anna do by herself when she was four?
questions.answer: She could comb her hair and put on her shoes by herself when she was four.

questions.question: When could Anna button her own clothes by herself?
questions.answer: She could do it when she was five.

questions.question: Why couldn't Grandma go to school when she was young?
questions.answer: It was because her family was too poor to send her to school.

questions.question: What could you do when you were six?
questions.answer: I could carry my school bag when I was six.

questions.question: What couldn't you do when you were two?
questions.answer: I couldn't have a bath by myself when I was two.
